name: argocd-azure-devops-extension
description: Azure DevOps extension for ArgoCD integration

scripts.clean: rimraf dist tasks/ArgocdSync/index.js tasks/ArgocdSync/common tasks/ArgocdSync/node_modules tasks/ArgocdRefresh/index.js tasks/ArgocdRefresh/common tasks/ArgocdRefresh/node_modules
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run package
scripts.full-clean: rimraf dist out tasks/ArgocdSync/index.js tasks/ArgocdSync/common tasks/ArgocdSync/node_modules tasks/ArgocdRefresh/index.js tasks/ArgocdRefresh/common tasks/ArgocdRefresh/node_modules
